Package io.github.epadronu.dwalin.utils.selenide

Class DwalinAllureSelenide

java.lang.Object
io.github.epadronu.dwalin.utils.selenide.DwalinAllureSelenide
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.codeborne.selenide.logevents.LogEventListener
@ParametersAreNonnullByDefault public final class DwalinAllureSelenide extends Object implements com.codeborne.selenide.logevents.LogEventListener

Extends the functionality of AllureSelenide by automatically attaching screenshots for every step (if enabled).

See Also:
  • AllureSelenide

    DwalinAllureSelenide()

    Creates a new DwalinAllureSelenide instance with the specified AllureLifecycle.
